Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Created by Hein Ferman 22 juni 2001
19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
18.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Adjusted argument list for ODHC01
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
05.11.2012 GB SCR17662 Extended test Plausibility checks and processing
01.11.2012 AS SCR#17613 deleting (old) temp. BADP file before generating it -> Task: TextViewer
13.09.2012 SH SCR17570 Extended test to enable button SCF payment
29.03.2012 SH SCR17202 Added button Transfer back; Disbaled BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR/BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR for modifications
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
12.03.2011 GB SCR16295 Extended condition for test (*3*)
25.11.2010 SH SCR16019 Added missing Zoom events for some buttons
18.11.2010 SH SCR15994 Added button SCF payment
22.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ002 by the BMQ005 in OPH101C_1
29.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Extended condition for verification the BADP_ADMNOLEDGER
30.07.2009 SH SCR14749 Enabled button Drafts also if BADP_UNALLOCATED = TRUE
and already BDPC rows exists
18.03.2009 GB SCR14435 Changed test *3
If the user enters a client number and leaves the field ...
05.01.2009 SH SCR14256 Extended test to enable button Cheques (disabled for
dummy payments via BPH252A)
24.11.2008 GB SCR14139 Extended condition for Ledger number
04.09.2008 SH SCR13851 Added new arguments OPH101C5
13.03.2008 SH SCR13449 Replaced windowmanger stuff by new GB100 programs
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Replaced GM100 to close window manager by FLWM010
28.02.2008 SH SCR13446 Removed the whole advances handling
26.02.2008 SH SCR13389 Reset BADP_LEDG_NO = 0 if users does not
comfirn the screen to book cheques/advances with YES
19.04.2006 SH SCR10986 Added new button "Drafts"
12.04.2006 AS SCR#10927 fixed open modes for table CLNT
21.03.2006 SH SCR10673 Disabled BADP_AMOUNTCOSTACCCURR
11.01.2006 SH SCR9984 Added pi.CallerID = 'OPH101C' to argument list of OSP007,
enables opening of result srceen in OSP007 also if only 1 invoices is detected,
becase auto. handling is too dangerous
07.11.2005 SH SCR9431 Fixed bug textviewer, wrong program was called to get
the directory name for the temp file which uses for the text viewer
//04-11-2005 JP SCR #9096 new Filelist function
25.07.2005 SH SCR8682 Added text viewer with BDPD_DESCRIPTIONS, only if
GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 115) (Info: Same logic as in OSP001C)
30.06.2005 SH SCR8626 Reduced the number of existing BDPD to make the + sign
visible from 7 to 6 rows
30.06.2005 SH SCR8614 Extended test to init Bank storno = TRUE with " and
GSET_YESNO = 'Y' (GSET_ID=109)
07.04.2005 SH SCR8076 Added new logic to init BADP_EXCHANGERATE_TYPE and
BADP_EXCHANGERATE, according to GSET_CODEDICTIONARY (GSET_ID=87),
depents no longer on GNRL_CODE = CZ/SK as before
on 10.3.2005 WJ SCR7946 change BADP_BANK_ADMNO --> CLNT101_ADMNO
08.10.2004 SH SCR7155 Removed field from screen, used only for testing purposes
28.09.2004 SH SCR7090 Added arguement BADP_BANKSTORNO to module which checks
the entries and init field bank storno with TRUE if BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR < 0 and
BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL > 0
15.09.2004 SH SCR6982 Added module to undo "Scanning prepare" actions if
BADP_ANNEXECSTOSCAN was set from TRUE to FALSE (only if BADP_HYPA_ID>0)
02.09.2004 SH SCR6941 Added info for user --> "Please check AWV reporting"
06.07.2004 JJ SCR6582 Word letter button
07.04.2004 EE SCR5868 changed behaviour of annexestoscan
22.03.2004 SH SCR5756 Added updates to BADP_EXCHGRATE =
CURR_EXCHGRATEHELLER and BADP_EXCHGRATE_TYPE = 0 if
unallocated was selected, see SCR for more details
12.01.2004 SH SCR5161 Adde new field BADP_BANK_STORNO to screen
23.12.2003 SH SCR5029 Changed calcl of field 3.6 Amount currency client if
- gv.OPPOSITEEXCHRATE = 'Y'
02.12.2003 SH SCR4943 Removed test "AND BADP_BANK_CURRENCY = EUR " for init
- BADP_EXCHGRATE_TYPE and BADP_EXCHGRATE
05.11.2003 SH SCR4700 Disabled button "Split payment" if program called from
- OPH104 (Unallocated)
31.10.2003 SH SCR4656 Set "Selection table" to 'No' in onlinetask, to enable
- the call of selectionlists by double click.
10.09.2003 SH SCR4334 Added new handling of exchange rate/type
- for countries CZ/SK; added Seletiontable for exchangerate type
08.09.2003 SH SCR4292 Added CND to Force record suffix in online program, in
case of pressing button OK the R.S. has to be executed, because sometimes the
client is initially filled and we have to check if the contractstatus is allowed
05.09.2003 SH SCR4258 If ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 5 then the fields
- BADP_ADMNOINITIAL / BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL / BADP_ADMNOLEDGER and
- BADP_LEDGER are mandatory now
15.08.2003 SH SCR4088 Removed check on BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR, it's
now optional
23.08.2003 SH SCR4088 Changed argument PI.CURRENCY for BPH109 from
- BADT_BANK_CURRENCY to current value of BADP_PAYCURR;
- Added test if BADP_EXCHGRATE higher or lower then 10 % as
- CURR_EXCHGRATEHELLER, ask user for acknowledgement
24.07.2003 BT SCR3992 Added a new textfield 'INTERCREDIT' if
CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = 'Y'
02.07.2003 SH SCR3912 Added new argument for BPH109 (Payments='P')
11.06.2003 JJ req JDO reenabled button Cheques
11.06.2003 SH SCR3733 Added new field BADP_UNALLOCATED_USER
11.06.2003 SH SCR3666 Set BADP_HANDLED to 'N' if some of the relevant fields
- changed by user and the payment was already handled, will be done by
- "OPH 101C_4 Check BADP_Booking", therefore I added a new argument to list
- pi.Messages which is only TRUE if the final test will be done
30.05.2003 SH SCR3652 Disabled button "Cheques" if RUNMODE()=0 (=Runtime)
13.05.2003 SH SCR3517 Added 3 new fields "exchange rate type", "exchange rate"
- and "amount currency client"
30.04.2003 SH SCR3355 Added a '+' if more then 7 BDPD lines exists in the
- multilinefield, for displaying the descriptions
23.04.2003 SH SCR3392 Call OPH101C2 Changed argument BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR
- by BADP_AMOUNTPAYCURR
27.03.2003 SH SCR3217 Removed CND BADP_BANK_CURRENCY =
- GNRL_CURRENCY to enable checkbox for "Book unallocated"
26.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
13.02.2003 SCR2946 Changed description part from tabel to one big textfield
06.02.2003 SCR2956 Disabled check BADP_AMOUNTPAYCURR <> 0 if
- BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR = 0
03.02.2003 SCR2906 SH Changed WIDTH of 2.6 Descriptionfields from 80 to 30
04.12.2002 SCR1781 Added new function 'Split payment"
04.12.2002 SCR2545 Set BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR = 0 if BADP_PAYCURRENCY
- changed by user
03.12.2002 SH Get [FLSETTINGS]RUNSRVJOBLOCAL from *.ini and if 'N' we will call
- BPH230 with GB007 as submit serverjob otherwise as a normal local job
14.10.2002 SH Add some comments
25.09.2002 SH Add new fields BADP_COST_NO and BADP_AMOUNTHELLERCOSTACCCUR
1. BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR and BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR now always modifiable
2. If BADT_MANUALPAYMENTS = FALSE set cursor on BADP_ADMNOINITIAL
3. Calculate auto. BADP_AMUONTPAYCURR or BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR
see description of SCR
02.09.2002 SCR2064 SH If a debtor or invoicenumber were searched with the search
- functions the selected ADMNO/CLNTNO/DEBTOR were not stored --> v.Changes
- will be now updated with INIT (before with UPDATE)
19.08.2002 SCR1941 SH If OSP007 will be called "Search invoices" all input
- parameters skipped now, start OSP007 without initial values
12.08.2002 BPH230 onyl has to be called, if OPH101C was called from OPH104
- and payment was complitely handled by user
25.07.2002 SCR1746 SH Add new argument if OPH 101C_1 Write BADP will be called,
- -->PI.Called from pogram (3) , to handle there the sanningpart for unallocated
- payments if OPH101C was called from OPH104
- Disabled locking if BDPD rows will be written in local temp file or dispalyed
- on screen, solved locking problems if user worked with several sessions and
- the same USER(0) on the desktop.
- Delete temp BDPD rows row by row if OPH101C will be closed
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new field "v.S_BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER" need as
- argument for diff. calls to obtain table BADT with primary key
16.07.2002 SCR1681 SH If OPH101C was called from OPH104 it's not allowed to
- leave OPH101C if payment was changed and booking is not possible
02.07.2002 SH Remove testscreen to start BPH230 and disable button OK, if
- OPH101C was called from OPH104 and BADP_UNALLOCATED = TRUE
//10-06-2002 JP add new button "PRedated" SCR #1444
20.06.2002 JJ SCR1506 -added button + task search invoices
-renamed button "search" to "search debtor"
10.04.2002 SH Changed call to ODHC01 --> new program
28.03.2002 SH Call BPH230 as submit serverjob --> GB701, for testing purposes
- electable as synchron/asynchron in The TestOnlineProgram
-- SCR#416 --> 13.12.2001 SH (Search Debtor, new searchparameters)
-- SCR#546 --> 17.01.2002 SH (New validation --> Contract status)
-- SCR#715 --> 31.01.2002 SH (Exten. test to enable field UNALLOCATED)
-- SCR#753 --> 06.02.2002 SH (Abort Loop BADP rows after ButtonCancel)
-- SCR#784 --> 13.02.2002 SH (Now all BDPD rows are displayed, BUG)
-- SCR#858 --> 20.02.2002 SH (Disabled one message if OPH101C called fromOPH101B
store changes if user pressed Enter and new selection)
--Called From --> 1 = OPH101A, 2 = OPH101B, 3 = OPH104, 4 = OPH106C
-- IF OPH101C called from OPH106C MODIFY is not allowed
-- SPECIAL INFORMATION
-- If BADP_INTERCREDIT = 'N' and BADP_BTCP_BTCH_ID = 0
-- it's only allowed to change data, when OPH101C called from OPH101B,
-- in this case OPH101C was called with pi.Called from program = 4,
-- the same as it's called from OPH106C
-- all payments for the actual BADT- row handled already
-- the following parameters only relevant when OPH101C called
-- from OPH101, need fo display first part on online screen or
-- see detail remarks
-- the two following parameters are relevant for starting the
-- Final test, when OPH101C called from OPH101A and the last
-- payment was reached
-- Abort Loop = TRUE after Button 'Cancel' was pressed, only relevant
-- when called from OPH101
-- If there are differences exist in Cheque/Advances/Ledger bookings = TRUE,
-- goto Task 'Online', see also R.S. BLOCK --> Button OK
-- relevant for call BPH230, if all payment are handled
-- see T.S.
-- Sum of BADP rows which were created by OPH101C4 and after splitting
-- of the actual BADP row
-- Uses for text viewer and window manager handling
-- Shortcut labels
-- Init path/file for text viewer
-- Shortcut handling
-- Check statement to ensure actualization of handled payments
only when not called from OPH106C (=only Query is allowed)
and not called from OPH104 and no errors were found in the
actual payment
Called from OPH101A --> only when last payment reached
Called from OPH101B --> for every payment
-- Make final update
When called from OPH101 or OPH101B and all payments are handled
When called from OPH104 (3) and no errors were found
INFO: When called from OPH104 (3), BPH230 only make bookings
for the actual handled payment
-- Submit serverjob BPH230 or call program directly, see *.ini [FLSETTINGS]
-- When called from OPH101B, OPH101B have to close automatically,
becuase the BANK_ACCOUNT_DAILY_TOTAL row is no longer on screen
-- Stop window manager, only if text viewer was activated
-- If payment was changed the actual values have to be reloaded
-- Assigning payments - Ledger
-- Assigning payments - Cheques
-- Assigning payments - Drafts
Split payment
-- Assign SCF payments
-- Button OK pressed or button Cancel with saving
or OPH101C was called from OPH104 and payment can not be handled
"It's necessarily to handle the payment if OPH101C was called from OPH104"
-- only when OPH101C called from OPH101A (1) or OPH101B (2) or
-- If the actual BADP was splittet with OPH101C4 it's very important to make
-- updates to the following both virtuals, they used to trigger the loop of all
-- BADP rows --> See OPH101
-- Only when OPH101C was called from OPH104 and payment was handled
-- Can't close payment
-- Handle next payment, if OPH101C called from OPH101
-- Abort handling payments, if OPH101C called from OPH101
-- OPH101C was called from OPH104 and payment can not closed, because payment
-- was not handled completely --> Restart OnlineTask (Payment has to be fully
-- handled if OPH101C was called from OPH104)
-- End BLOCK "Can't close payment"
-- Differences exist in the DetailBookings in Cheques/Advances/Ledgers/Split pay
-- Restart OnlineTask
-- End Block Button OK
-- Exit Programm after pressing Button Cancel without saving
-- initialize with BADP_BANK_ADMNO, when BADP_ADMNOINIT empty
-- initialize with BADP_BANK_ADMNO, when BADP_ADMNO_LEDGER empty
-- Create tempfile for descriptions, able to modify in onlinescreen
-- need for confirmation of messageboxes
-- Selected debtor from ODC search screen for word document
-- if there are BANKACCOUNT_DAILY_PAYMENT_CHAD rows
-- exists for this payment, it's not allowed to remove/change the
-- v.BADP_LEDGER
-- Check if data were entered on the special screen OPH101C1 -->
-- 'Ledger'
-- Check if data were entered on the special screen OPH101C4 -->
-- 'Assigning payment - Clients'
-- Get BANK_LEDG_NO_CHEQUES and BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES,
-- to give the User the possibility to book the payment on special
-- --> program OPH101C2 or OPH101C3, see below virtual v.BADP_LEDGER
-- Valid v.BADP_CLNTNI_INITIAL and get CLNT-Name for display
-- Contract status does not allowed bookings
-- Info to user --> "Please check AWV reporting"
-- Valid Administration number ledger
-- Check v.BANK_LEDGER in DB and get LDGR_NAME for display
-- Valid Ledger number
-- If the row exists in LEDGER but LDGR_MANUALBOOKINGNOTALL = Y
when BADP_LEDGER=BANK_NO_CHEQUES assign should be made
on Cheque screen
-- Not in use since 25.09.2002 SH
-- Valid v.BADP_AMOUNTPAYCURR
-- Valid v.BADP_PAYCURRENCY
-- For bank currency
-- If key 'Esc' was pressed, the same function as Button 'Cancel'
-- If User pressed the key 'Esc' or called directly an other program
-- over the menu, he will asked for confirmation, if he changed some
-- entries
-- Sometimes it colud happened that the ADMNO, CLNTNO is initially filled and in
this case the R.S. has to be executed to check if the contractstatus is
allowed for the client, see also Ctrl+C --> "Force Record suffix", only if OK
was pressed
-- Errors found
-- No ERRORS
-- Write to BADP
-- Write to BDPD, if there were made changes for descriptions
-- Checkbox is desclected now
-- Checkbox is selected now
-- Only if BADP_EXCHGRATE more then 10% higher or lower then
CURR_EXCHGRATEHELLER, ask the user for acknowledgement
-- If answer = 'Yes', save entries and perform the diff. tests, the same as
button "OK" was pressed
-- Set cursor on field "BADP_EXCHGRATE"
-- Reset virtuals if client was updated with 0
-- Reset virtuals if payment currency was changed and <> BADP_BANK_CURRENCY
-- If the paymentcurrency changed set BADP_AMOUNTCOSTACCCURR = 0
-- If the new payment currency = account currency then auto. calculate
the bank costs
-- If ADML_LTYP_TYPE <> 5, reset client number, if <> 0, because multiple
choices to book the payment are not allowed, only allowed if
ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 5 it's possible!
-- Checkbox is desclected now
-- Checkbox is selected now
-- Daily rate
-- Heller rate
-- Manual rate
-- Reset exchange rate if exchange rate type was reseted manually
-- OPH101CTB is directly called here, not from parent task, because users have to add a BPOR row
via OPH101CTB if "Transfer back" is checked and BADP_BPOR_ID = 0, else closing OPH101C is not possible

ExpSyntax.val: ({0,43}=0 OR {0,54}) AND NOT ({0,62}) AND NOT ({0,64}) AND NOT (ExpCalc ('76'EXP) OR ExpCalc ('77'EXP)) AND NOT ({0,13}) AND NOT ({0,16}) OR {0,27}>0
NOT ({0,62}) AND NOT ({0,64}) AND NOT (ExpCalc ('76'EXP) OR ExpCalc ('77'EXP)) AND NOT ({0,13}) AND NOT ({0,16}) OR {0,43}>0
NOT ({0,16}) AND {0,27}=0 AND {0,43}=0 AND NOT ({0,62}) AND NOT ({0,64}) AND NOT (ExpCalc ('76'EXP) OR ExpCalc ('77'EXP)) OR {0,13}
NOT ({0,16}) AND {0,27}=0 AND {0,43}=0 AND NOT ({0,62}) AND NOT ({0,64}) AND NOT (ExpCalc ('77'EXP)) AND NOT ({0,13}) OR {0,9} AND {0,8}>0
NOT ({0,13}) AND {0,27}=0 AND {0,43}=0 AND NOT ({0,62}) AND NOT ({0,64}) AND NOT (ExpCalc ('76'EXP) OR ExpCalc ('77'EXP)) AND {1,2}<>3

Text.val: 01.11.2012 AS In the past with I/O timing immediate task CreateTempFile did always overwrite temp. BADP file
This does not happen with I/O timming "on demand" if there's no BDPD rows so we need to ensure that an
eventually existing file gets deleted in any case. Otherwise program will show information from a different payment
-- Button OK
-- If OPH101C was called from OPH1016 not changes allowed, leave program
-- without any checks and database modifications
-- Button Cancel
-- Check and Save entries
-- no check and save entries
-- Abort Loop, only relevant when OPH101C was called from OPH101
--Other actions
-- 'P' = Call OPH105 --> Predated_Cheques_Draft
-- 'L' = Call OPH101C1 --> Ledger
-- 'Q' = Call OPH101C2 --> Cheques
-- 'D' = Call OPH102C5 --> Drafts
-- 'B' = Call OPH101C4 --> Assign payments - Clients
-- 'F' = Call OPH101C7 --> Assign SCF payment
//JP SCR #9096 new Filelist function
